metadata.title: CVE-2019-19919 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of handlebars prior to 4.3.0 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollutionleading to Remote Code Execution. Templates may alter an Object's __proto__and __defineGetter__ properties, which may allow an attacker to executearbitrary code through crafted payloads.

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
